name: Cat-aclysm
description:
In a peaceful rhythmic city run by music beats, lives a cat who is fed up with his owner constantly annoying him, and decides to run away from home, starting a revolution to take over the city. Vexa, desperate to hold Catuccino again, decides to follow him and get him back.




Traverse the beautiful city while you interact with it!


Fast-paced battles and unique enemy abilities!




This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
